From 7-20 July 2024, [we](https://bds3.org/our-team) organized the second edition of the "Ukrainian Biological Data Science Summer School ([link to my post on the first edition](2023-07-ubds3.html)). 

Here's an article [Summer school in wartime](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41592-024-02329-z) in Nature Methods, and a newspapaper article from the Rhein-Neckar-Zeitung (local newspaper of Heidelberg), [in German](../photos/240803-RNZ-UBDS3.jpg){.lightbox}.
